description: System-generated primary key uniquely identifying this maintenance center.
Business code used to reference the maintenance center in transactions and user interfaces.
Human-readable name of the maintenance center.
Indicates whether the center is currently enabled for operational use.
Flags this center as the default selection for new requests, assets, or users, depending on configuration.
Indicates if requesters may self-enroll or associate themselves with this center.
Primary key of the category grouping this center belongs to; likely an organizational or service category; confirm with SME.
Business identifier of the category assigned to this center; confirm with SME.
Name of the category grouping for this center; confirm with SME.
Primary key referencing the supervising person responsible for this center.
Login or employee identifier of the supervising person for this center.
Full name of the supervising person for this center.
Primary key of the associated storeroom managing parts inventory for this center.
Business code for the associated storeroom used by this center.
Name of the associated storeroom used by this center.
Primary key of the associated tool room used for issuing/returning tools.
Business code of the tool room associated with this center.
Name of the tool room associated with this center.
Monetary budget allocated to this center for operations, parts, and services.
Primary key referencing the purchasing organization used for this center.
Business identifier of the purchasing organization associated with this center.
Name of the purchasing organization associated with this center.
Primary key referencing the default purchasing agent/contact for this center.
Login or employee identifier of the default buyer for this center.
Name of the default buyer/contact handling purchases for this center.
Primary key of the default shipping destination used on purchase orders from this center.
Business identifier of the default shipping destination for this center.
Name of the default shipping destination for this center.
Attention line for the default shipping address.
Address line 1 for the shipping destination.
Address line 2 for the shipping destination.
Address line 3 for the shipping destination.
Primary key of the default billing account or remittance destination for this center.
Business identifier of the default billing destination for this center.
Name of the default billing destination for this center.
Attention line for the billing address.
Address line 1 for the billing destination.
Address line 2 for the billing destination.
Address line 3 for the billing destination.
Street address of the center’s physical location.
City of the center’s physical location.
State or province of the center’s physical location.
Postal or ZIP code of the center’s physical location.
Country of the center’s physical location.
Primary contact phone number for the center.
Emergency police contact number for this location; confirm usage with SME.
Security office contact number for this location; confirm usage with SME.
Emergency fire department contact number for this location; confirm usage with SME.
Fax number for the center.
General contact email address for the center.
Indicates whether automated notifications are sent via email for this center; confirm behavior with SME.
Description or label for the email notification recipients or configuration.
Website or intranet link with information related to this center.
Free-text notes or internal comments about the center.
Image or file reference representing the center; storage format may vary; confirm with SME.
User-defined text field for tenant-specific attributes.
User-defined text field for tenant-specific attributes.
User-defined text field for tenant-specific attributes.
User-defined text field for tenant-specific attributes.
User-defined text field for tenant-specific attributes.
User-defined date field for tenant-specific attributes.
User-defined date field for tenant-specific attributes.
User-defined boolean flag for tenant-specific logic.
User-defined boolean flag for tenant-specific logic.
Likely references a labor record used for demonstrations, defaults, or templates; confirm with SME.
IP address of the client that performed the last modification (audit trail).
Primary key of the user who performed the last modification (audit trail).
Initials of the user who performed the last modification (audit trail).
Type of operation recorded for the last change (e.g., edit) for auditing.
Timestamp of the most recent change recorded for this record.
Starting date used to calculate preventive maintenance cycles for assets managed by this center.
Risk classification associated with this center’s operations or assets; confirm definition and scale with SME.
Numeric counter or offset used in preventive maintenance scheduling calculations for this center.
Currency code applied to financial amounts tracked for this center.
Approval workflow type governing service requests or work orders in this center; confirm rules with SME.
Approval workflow type governing purchase orders generated by this center.
Email-to-SMS gateway address used to send text notifications for this center.
Name of the custom form template used for requests or work orders associated with this center.
